DOC.brief_summary: The study hypothesis drink different juice affect body 's response air pollution . Subjects expose air pollution 2-hour car ride NJ ( New Jersey ) Turnpike . Each subject ask twice . Before one car ride , subject ask drink orange juice . Before car ride , subject ask drink beet juice . Samples blood exhale breath collect , immediately , 24 hour car ride . Levels nitrites/nitrates measure blood breath .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Juice Types Responses Air Pollution
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects participate two exposure session . The air pollution exposure consist 2-hour car ride along NJ Turnpike . Samples collect 3 time point exposure session : pre-exposure , immediately post-exposure , 24 hour post-exposure . Blood sample collect immediately 5-minute occlusion time point . The subject also ask provide sample exhale breath complete symptom stress questionnaire time point . Blood sample analyze serum nitrite . Exhaled breath sample analyze nitrate nitrite .
DOC.criteria: Healthy Must live within 20 mile Piscataway , NJ â€¢ Are current smoker Are pregnant breastfeeding Are HIVpositive Have active medical condition high blood pressure , asthma , diabetes serious disease Have heart condition atrial flutter , atrial fibrillation pacemaker Are unable ride comfortably car 2 hour Travel EOHSI ( Environmental Occupational Health Sciences Institute ) Clinic Center major highway 3 mile ( Garden State Parkway , New Jersey Turnpike , Routes 287 , 1 , 18 , 9 ) .
